name: Erntehelfer
description:
Drive your combine harvester and collect crops. Sell them for big money, enlarge your fields and buy new machinery to automate your crop harvest.

[Ludum Dare 52 Entry]

Instructions:
Buy upgrades to keep your profits high.
Try to avoid bankruptcy by providing a steady yield,

Controls:
Use Arrow keys or WASD to control the tractor and farm corn.
Buy upgrades by using your mouse.

Tips

  • Always have an eye on the yield bar. If it falls below zero, you loose.
  • Try different update strategies for max points :)
